question: Will brokers/producers earn CE credits for training?
text:
Will brokers/producers earn CE credits for training? 
          
        
Earlier this year, Pennie solicited feedback from brokers participating in the Pennie Broker Workgroup. Many of those who commented said that CE credits would provide a limited utility and may increase the cost of producing the training. As a result, Pennie decided not to offer CE credits through the training at this time. However, this is something we plan to revisit moving forward.
